title: Got questions? We get that.
subtitle: Everything you need to know about LeadGen Pro.

items.a: LeadGen Pro is a lead and pipeline management tool. You get a shared pipeline (Kanban), projects, tasks, deals, and team features so your whole team can track leads from first contact to closed deal.
Sales and marketing teams that want one place to manage leads, assign owners, track deals, and stay aligned. It works for small teams and scales with roles and permissions.
Yes. You can create a free account and start adding leads, building your pipeline, and inviting your team. No credit card required to get started.

items.q: How do I invite my team?
items.a: Admins can invite team members by email from the app. Invitees get a link to sign up and join your workspace with the role you choose (e.g. Editor or Admin).

items.q: Can I assign leads to different owners?
items.a: Yes. Each lead has an owner, and you can filter and sort by owner. Only users you invite to your workspace can be set as owners.
We use secure authentication and role-based access. Only invited members can access your workspace, and you control who sees what.
